reqs: Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 101, PHYS 102, PHYS 107, PHYS 108, PHYS 117, PHYS 118, PHYS 153, PHYS 157, PHYS 158, SCIE 001 and one of MATH 200, STAT 200, STAT 203, STAT 241, BIOL 300.
description: Observations and basic characteristics of extrasolar planets, including their formation, evolution, and potential for supporting life. Not to be used to satisfy any Physics and Astronomy major or honours specialization requirement, but may be used as an upper-level science elective.
